name: Dice Lord (Noël Widmer, Flo722, Dr.Bleep, sternspielk, Lithimlin, chiptami)
name_original: Dice Lord (Noël Widmer, Flo722, Dr.Bleep, sternspielk, Lithimlin, chiptami)
description:
A luck-based strategy and puzzle game in a pixel-art style.

You, the gambling adventurer, have entered a strange-looking dungeon.
You find that inside, your actions are determined by the roll of your dice. Neat!
